item.title: English Writing
item.description: 2017 英语(一) Directions: You are to write a email to James Cook, a newly arrived Austrlian professor,recommending some tourist attractions in your city. Please give reasons for your recommendation. Self Analysis: 1. 第一段表达出对James Cook教授的到来感到高兴 2. 第二段开始介绍自
